feat.value: Some others went to him to hear a story from him.
And he did not say anything to them.
When they saw his baskets, they said to Abraham, his disciple,
What are you doing with these baskets?'
He said, 'We usually send them out to this place and that.'
But the monk heard and he said, 'Your Sisoes eats in this place and that.'
And they heard this and they profited greatly.
And they left, rejoicing, having been strengthened by his humility.
